name: Saving Mr. Snuggles
description:
Your cat has had enough, he ran away to the mob and it's your job to save him ! Only you don't want to attract any attention because you are clearly outnumbered, so you have to do it stealthy. Try and catch your cat as fast as possible !

- There are 20 Levels to beat !

- Try and complete it in the fastest time possible !

Movement -- Up/Down/Left/Right

Z -- Restart if you die

X -- Hard Mode
